MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH16 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.54AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required to our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12.19PM on 13 March 2021.
